title: Which Wizard Will Kill Me?
alternative_title: Who's the Wizard That's Gonna Kill Me? ; Which Wizard Will Kill Me ; Which Wizard Will Kill Me? ; Who's the Wizard, Who'll Kill Me? ; 要杀我的魔法师是谁 ; 날 죽일 마법사는 누구
status: Who's the Wizard That's Gonna Kill Me? ; Which Wizard Will Kill Me ; Which Wizard Will Kill Me? ; Who's the Wizard, Who'll Kill Me? ; 要杀我的魔法师是谁 ; 날 죽일 마법사는 누구
description:
Description :
        Life at Papilon, the elite magic school, is full of hardships for Rhea who's failing in every possible way. One day, when her hidden friendship with the top-student and her childhood friend Sion gets discovered by the mysterious transfer student, Joon, Rhea can’t help but notice the energy of death surrounding him… Who will be the wizard to kill her?!
